Title: Brunchsquatch
Director: Ian Hamilton, Mauricio Pardo, Bernard Derriman
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Lizzie Molyneux, Wendy Molyneux
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Bob decides to serve brunch to compete with Jimmy Pesto; the Belcher kids help Mr. Fischoeder's brother hide from him.
